<hr>
Read data stored in an online spreadsheet (Google)
```{r}
library(gsheet)

personaDF <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oInZyzyVOcQCHEV1alHSb_sRXFw1xD_nch1w3nGr1TE")
```
